title: Pool Nation FX out now on Steam
text:
Rack 'em up as the ultimate billiards simulator - Pool Nation FX from Cherry Pop Games - is now amiable on Steam. 93% User Approval Rating on Original Pool Nation (PC), 3 Million Downloads on Xbox One - New Pool Hall and Online Tournaments Being Added for PC Release
Manchester (PRWEB) October 07, 2015
After a highly successful launch onto Xbox One earlier this year, indie developer Cherry Pop Games has now delivered the ultimate billiards simulator Pool Nation FX, onto Steam's Early Access program. Available starting today, Pool Nation FX delivers a stunningly realistic on- or offline billiards experience, expanding upon the incredibly popular Xbox One release with a variety of new multiplayer features, trick shot mode, ruleset customization and more.
Developed with Unreal Engine 4, Pool Nation FX is available now for $12.99 and as a special limited-time bonus, owners of the original Pool Nation on Steam can purchase the game a discount of 30% off the game's full price
For more information, please visit - http://www.poolnationfx.com/ or buy Pool Nation FX now on Steam.
Prepare for pixel perfect physics, photo-realistic graphics and super-detailed visuals in this truly immersive representation of the sport. Practice, spectate and play live matches seamlessly online, compete in Leagues, share, challenge and create epic trick shots with our exclusive Trickshot Editor, enroll in the Pool Nation Cup, explore the unique rule set customization tool and re-discover this much-loved sport.
Pool Nation FX’s Key Features:
Customization
Use the rule set customisation tool to create favorite game type using nine existing rule sets including; 9 Ball, 8 Ball, 8 Ball UK, Snooker, Killer and more
Control your aim level settings; aiming aid off and on, novice through to pro
Use the in-game currency to customize table baize, cues, balls and decals
Raise, lower, and rotate trickshot objects on all axis in the artistic pool mode
Adjustable difficulty levels in online and offline game modes
Smooth physics and stunning graphics
Game Modes & Features:
Trickshots - Create unique trickshots with the artistic pool mode, including a variety of objects and special effects
Leagues (Online competitive mode) - Players must climb the ladder and play with skill to avoid relegation to lower leagues
Play for Cash – Online competitive mode. Players progress through varying difficulty levels, the more coins you earn, the higher levels you unlock
Friendlies – Invite friends to play online, customize your game type, rules, locations and more
Versus – Offline game for one or two players. Play against the AI or locally against friends.
Pool Career – Offline single-player career, start out in the qualifiers earn a place in the first cup.
Snooker Career – Enjoy traditional Snooker, along with the standard billiards game types
Daily Challenges – Play the daily game of 3 Ball to unlock a chance to win free coins, pot 3 balls to win a random daily prize
Daily Trickshot Challenges – Complete the specific trickshot challenge to win coins. Each provides a selection of designated objects and effects to complete the task given
Endurance – Keep sinking balls into pockets as they fall from above. Pot multiple balls in a row, or perform a skill shot and earn a ‘Drop Stop’ giving you a brief respite from the falling balls.
During the Steam Early Access development cycle, the following features will be added:
Spectate, join and play matches seamlessly online in a digital Pool Nation Pool Hall
Online Tournaments for 8 or more people
Customizable PC specific controls for extra customisation
# # #
About Cherry Pop Games
Cherry Pop Games is an independent, multi-platform development studio located in Manchester, UK dedicated to producing amazing games for all types of players. The team’s first title was Pool Nation, which was released on Xbox LIVE Arcade in 2012, followed shortly after on the PlayStation Network. Cherry Pop Games' most recent project is Pool Nation FX, developed using Unreal Engine 4 which will release in 2015.
